document.heading: Wastewater System Regulation Amendment Temporary Act of 1987

history.narrative: Law 7-54, the “Wastewater System Regulation Amendment Temporary Act of 1987,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-281. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 14, 1987, and September 29, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 16, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-87 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
